name: Puzzles Design System
description:
Welcome to the Puzzles Design System.

  • Text Styles (Responsive: Desktop, Mobile Styles)
  • Colour Styles (Primary, Secondary, Supporting, Greyscale)
  • Effect Styles (5 Elevation)
  • Grid Styles (Small, Medium, Large)
  • Autolayout, Component Properties & Variants (Prototype ready)
  • Sample/demo components to get you started
  • Popular Payment Logos (39), Shipping Logos (4) and Feather Icons (287 in 2 sizes)
  • 29 Separate Components with examples
